Make hay while the blue sunshines
(Time to split up). munnorgal-um varungala sandhathiyinar-um
science uh padichu sudana unaku. jillunu thanni iruku
Na thotta antha current uh ke shock adikum

questions.question: 1.Once upon a time in the land of cryptic, there lived a boy named Caesar. He was an ambitious lad who is embarking on a quest to solve the puzzles that are waiting to be found. On his adventurous journey, he found the first challenge.
questions.cipher: ITRIX VDL ER VLOHXR BEORQ MOLCOIJJAO?
questions.hint: Map the word ITRX to ABCD and the rest of the alphabets to the rest of the letters other than ITRX A-I,B-T,C-R,D-X,E-A,F-B,G-C,H-D,..

questions.question: 2.He found quite another challenge
questions.hint:
See these words in a different way
Ex:ARUN LOVES DOGS AND CATS can be written as
ALSSC RODAA UVONT NEGDS
Read the first letter of each word and then second and continue in the same way

questions.question: 3.On reaching the new cipher land, He found a code which is encrypted by his very own name, the Caesar Cipher.
questions.cipher: ZKLFK LV WKH FDSLWDO RI JXMDUDW

questions.question: 4.The next Cipher is based on the phone keypad.
Crack it and make it. ask your coder to help you crack
